channel.title: Hybridscape runserver.bat?
channel.description: ive been trying to make myself a runserver.bat file for hybridscape as the onyl way i can find of staeting is is laoding up moparscape3.2 and clicking the button... the best i could come up with is stealing the runserver file from a different source and implementing it into hybridscape but i get this when i try and run it... [code]Server: ./HybridScape/npc.cfg: file not found. Server: ./HybridScape/npcdrops.cfg: file not found. Server: ./HybridScape/autospawn.cfg: file not found. Server: ./HybridScape/item.cfg: file not found. Server: ./HybridScape/drops.cfg: file not found. Server: ./HybridScape/shops.cfg: file not found. Server: Starting HybridScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 [/code]

item.title: Hybridscape runserver.bat?
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

it doesnt need a compiler… and it doesnt have one either well it does but only for the aryan. the awy ive been changing and editing hybridscape is by chaning the cfg files… and theres no compiler for them.

EDIT: this is the files i have in my hybridscape folder

God… as i said
some compilers dont pick up things when you compile them!
maybe you have the files but when you are compiling its not finiding them
so then when you run it will ask you for them

item.title: Hybridscape runserver.bat?
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

its means that those files are missing ;-)[br][size=1]Posted on: October 30, 2007, 10:34:11 AM[/size][hr]Server: ./HybridScape/npc.cfg: file not found.
Server: ./HybridScape/npcdrops.cfg: file not found.
Server: ./HybridScape/autospawn.cfg: file not found.
Server: ./HybridScape/item.cfg: file not found.
Server: ./HybridScape/drops.cfg: file not found.
Server: ./HybridScape/shops.cfg: file not found.

NOTFOUND = isent on right spot or is deleted

item.title: Hybridscape runserver.bat?
item.dc:creator: @zilchuary zilchuary
item.description:
@zilchuary wrote:

Try using this

@echo off color 0a title Server java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server
